src:
Obsesi Cetak Gol, Evolusi Permainan Mohamed Salah di Liverpool
06 Nov 2019, 14:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan penyerang Liverpool, Michael Owen, menilai ada evolusi dari gaya bermain Mohamed Salah. Pemain asal Mesir sudah berubah dibanding lima tahun lalu. Salah diklaim menjadi pemain yang terobsesi mencetak gol.
Mohamed Salah sempat tertatih saat pindah dari Basel ke Chelsea. Dia tidak mendapat kesempatan bermain di tim yang kala itu diasuh Jose Mourinho. Salah kemudian memilih pindah.
Tujuan pertama Salah yakni Fiorentina. Separuh musim di Florence, Salah mencetak enam gol dan tiga assist. Setelah itu, Salah pindah ke AS Roma. Hasilnya cukup bagus. Salah mencetak 14 gol dan enam assist di Serie A musim 2015/2-16.
Semusim kemudian, Salah tetap tampil bagus bersama Roma. Dia mampu mencetak 15 gol dan 11 assist. Konsistensi Salah kemudian membuat Liverpool membelinya. The Reds membayar 40 juta pounds untuk membeli Salah.
text:
Obsession on Scoring, the Evolution of Mohamed Salah's Game at Liverpool
Nov 6 2019, 14:59 by Bola.net
Former Liverpool striker Michael Owen believes there is an evolution in Mohamed Salah's playing style. Players from Egypt have changed compared to five years ago. Salah is claimed to be a player who is obsessed with scoring goals.
Mohamed Salah was limped when he moved from Basel to Chelsea. He did not get a chance to play in the team at the time cared for by Jose Mourinho. One then chose to move.
Salah's first destination was Fiorentina. Half the season in Florence, Salah scored six goals and three assists. After that, Salah moved to AS Roma. The results are quite good. Salah scored 14 goals and six assists in the 2015 / 2-16 Serie A season.
One season later, Salah continued to look good with Roma. He is able to score 15 goals and 11 assists. Incorrect consistency then makes Liverpool buy it. The Reds paid 40 million pounds to buy Salah.
